Struggling to remember tasks and deadlines? Reminder extension is here to help! It's a simple and user-friendly Chrome extension that lets you easily create and manage reminders directly within your browser.

Key features:

Effortless reminder creation: Add reminders in seconds with a clear and intuitive interface.
Stay organized: Keep track of upcoming deadlines, to-dos, and important events.
Never miss a beat: Get notified at the right time with customizable alerts and pop-ups.
Seamless browsing experience: Integrates smoothly with Chrome, so you can stay focused and productive.
